headline: Fidelity Capital & Income Fund Q4 2024 Review
summary: High-yield bonds gained 0.16% in Q4 as yields surged to a 4-month high in December and Fed delivered two interest-rate cuts and signaled its plan to slow rate reductions in 2025.
